message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, but I'm open to discussing the price further.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $8,500 at this time. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I'm aiming for a higher price point, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.

Alice, I understand you're looking for a higher price, but unfortunately, $11,000 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to go to $9,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can reach an agreement.
